akari.name: Akari
akari.description: A pretty good magical support. Does pretty good if you have a slot empty for dedicated debuffer/sub tank, she also applies a lifesteal buff that lasts for 1 attack on UB. She's also a cutie. I would suggest talent bloom her after you're done with the recommended in dungeon coins
akari.ubdesc: increases all allies magical attack by a small amount annd grant a lifesteal buff for their next attack
akari.s1desc: Medium magical damage to the nearest enemy
akari.s2desc: Reduces the nearest enemy's Magical defense by a large amount
akari.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical attack power at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own's magical attack power at the start of the battle**
akari.s1plus: Medium damage to the nearest enemy, **also reduces the magical defense by a small amount**

angel akari.name: Angel Akari
angel akari.description: A single target magical attacker that does well in manual battle. She acts like Eriko but magical. She has really high buff number. But the time that it's up is low. But she will always do S1 before doing S2. It's better to watch out for that if you're doing Manual.
angel akari.ubdesc: Massive magical damage to the nearest enemy
angel akari.s1desc: Increases own magical attack as well as magical crit rate by a large amout. Increase damage when doing crits with magical attacks by 24%
angel akari.s2desc: Medium magical damage to the earest enemy, this skill will deal 3x damage instead of 2x when doing crits
angel akari.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical attack power at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own magical defense at the start of the battle**

akino.name: Akino, Ohohohojousama
akino.description: The OHOHOHOJousama. She was seen as pretty mediocre before her 6★. But it turns out that, that was all she needs. She became one of the best attackers to date(While also being tanky). She has really good multipliers on UB. Be sure to train her if you have her.
akino.ubdesc: Massive physical damage to the nearest enemy
akino.s1desc: Medium physical damage to the nearest enemy, increases own physical attack by a small amount. Move to the front alot and start OHOHOHO, if attacked while laughing, she will do counter that does physical medium damage attack in an area
akino.s2desc: Set a field and restore health of all allies in range by a small amount
akino.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Medium increase to own physical defense at the start of the battle**
akino.s1plus: Medium physical damage to the nearest enemy, Increase own physical attack and **TP gain rate** by a small amount. **Taunt enemies.** Move to the front alot and start OHOHOHO, if attacked while laughing, she will do counter that does physical medium damage attack in an area

anna.name: Anna
anna.description: She has pretty high damage for how she is now. Just be sure not to use her UB for whatever reason if you plan on letting her do the tanking as well. She has a pretty good Magical defense down despite it being small, She spams it literally every other attack. She effectively only has 1 skill
anna.ubdesc: Medium magical damage to all enemies. Zeroes her defences in both physical and magical for the rest of the battle
anna.s1desc: Medium magical damage to the nearest enemy
anna.s2desc: When health is under 10%, deal large magical damage to all enemies near her. She will also be unconcious after the skill ends
anna.exdesc: Increases magical attack by a medium amount. **5★: Increase magical attack by a large amount.**
anna.s1plus: **Reduces the magical defense of the nearest enemy by a small amount**, and then deal medium magical damage to them

summer anna.name: Summer Anna
summer anna.description: A meme character. Honestly I've never seen people use her. But you can try. I'm not gonna give my thoughts as I have no idea how she does things
summer anna.ubdesc: Massive magical damage to the nearest enemy. If there is only 1 enemy remaining, also increases her magical attack by a large amount
summer anna.s1desc: Medium magical damage to the nearest enem, reduces the enemy's magical defense by a medium amount.
summer anna.s2desc: Reduces all allies except herself's magical attack power by 90% but increase her own magical attack by a massive amount and crit rate by a large amount.
summer anna.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle**

anne.name: Anne
anne.description: One of the best buffers for magical characters in the game (Post UE), She does higher than average damage. She also allows more characters to do alot of damage. Would recommend to talent blossom
anne.ubdesc: Massive magical damage to the nearest enemies, Allies under the influence of Heroic Spirit will gain a large amount of magical attack
anne.s1desc: Medium damage to the nearest enemy
anne.s2desc: Applies Heroic Spirit buff to ann and all allies near her, increases her magical attack power by a large amount and give her an action speed buff by a small amount(10%)
anne.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle**
anne.s1plus: Medium damage to the nearest enemy, **if anne is under the Heroic Spirit buff, all allies will restore 100TP. Otherwise, boost her action speed by a small amount(25%)**

aoi.name: Owie
aoi.description: She can cripple a tank in arena. But that's about all that she can do really. She can't do much outside of arena. That being said. She still is pretty good at crippling enemy Tanks. Though it's advisable to bring 2 poisons if you're actually going that route
aoi.ubdesc: Medium physical damage to all enemies in range, targest the closest enemy
aoi.s1desc: Medium physical damage to the nearest enemy and inflict them with poison
aoi.s2desc: Small physical damage to the nearest enemy and inflict them with poison
aoi.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle**
aoi.s1plus: Medium physical damage to the nearest enemy and inflict them with poison, **if the target is already poisoned. Inflict venom**

uniform aoi.name: Uniform Aoi, Transfer Student Aoi
uniform aoi.description: One of the best Debuffer for CB. But with how CBs are nowadays. You need a 2nd debuffer anyways, so she's always welcomed. Do not that she doesn't have the same amount of Poison dealing skills as her normal counterpart.
uniform aoi.ubdesc: Large physical damage to the nearest enemy, inflicts them with poison and reduce the enemy's defenses by a large amount
uniform aoi.s1desc: Deploys a field that deals small physical damage. If the enemy is poisoned, deals additional medium amount of damage
uniform aoi.s2desc: Lowers the nearest's enemy physical defense by a large amount. If the target is inflicted by poison, deals an addtional large amount of damage
uniform aoi.exname: Bocchi no Kyouji/Pride of a Loner
uniform aoi.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own physical attack power at the start of the battle**
uniform aoi.s1plus: Sets a field that deals small physical damage, Inflicts them with poison. Additionally, reduce the enemy's physical defense by a small amount
uniform aoi.guild: Forestier/ Transferred to St. Theresa Girls' Academy

arisa.name: Arisa
arisa.description: Self accelerating attacker. Much like Shiori. Except much much much more shittier. Not worth levelling really. Unless you really like her
arisa.ubname: Watashi no Ya ga anata wo tsuranuku!
arisa.ubdesc: Massive physical damage to the nearest enemy, increase damage with consecutive use
arisa.s1desc: Small physical damage to the enemy with the highest Magical attack, also lowers their action speed by a small amount (20%)
arisa.s2desc: Recover own TP by a medium amount. If UB has been used in this battle. Recover a large amount of TP instead
arisa.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle.**
arisa.s1plus: Small physical damage to the enemy with the highest Magical attack, lowers their action speed by a small amount (20%) **additionally reduce their magical attack by a small amount**

ayane.name: Ayane
ayane.description: An arena character. She can basically corners anyone that she can reach. Basically putting the enemy frontline to the backline so you can reach the backline. She is very powerful at 6★
ayane.ubdesc: Deals large physical damage to the nearest enemy, pushes the target by a large amount and inflict them with stun
ayane.s1desc: Small physical damage to an area around the frontmost enemy and inflict then with stun
ayane.s2desc: Small physical damage to an area around the frontmost enemy and reduce their physical defense by a small amount
ayane.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Also, medium increase to own magical defense at the start of the battle**
ayane.s1plus: Small physical damage to an area around the frontmost enemy and inflict then with stun. **Additionally, reduce the physical attack of one enemy and reduce their action speed by a medium amount(20%)
ayane.upgradedesc: **Massive** amount of physical damage in an area around the nearest enemy, **pushes them away by a large amount and inflict stun**

christmas ayane.name: Christmas Ayane
christmas ayane.description: A physical attacker that uses her own HP to deal damage. Somewhat powerful, kind of a niche use unless you really pay attentions to your runs. Her UE increases her HP. So it might be noteworthy to level that if you have the resources to, her self buff lasts enough for 2 stacks
christmas ayane.ubdesc: Deals massive amount of physical damage to the nearest enemy, but uses up a considerable amount of HP in return
christmas ayane.s1desc: Boosts own physical attack by a small amount
christmas ayane.s2desc: Deals medium damage to the nearest enemy and pushes them away by a small distance
christmas ayane.exdesc: Increases own physical attack by a medium amount at the start of the battle. **5★: Increases own physical attack by a medium amount at the start of the battle**
christmas ayane.s1plus: Boost own physical attack by a large amount and boost action speed by a large amount (75%)

ayumi.name: Ayumi, Background character
ayumi.description: Definitely a pretty good arena character if you're using her defensively. Offensively wise. I don't think she'll work as well
ayumi.ubdesc: Medium physical damage to an area infront of her, inflicts confusion and blind
ayumi.s1desc: Small physical damage to an area infront of her, reduces the enemy's physical attack by a small amount
ayumi.s2desc: Reduces the physical defenses of the enemies in an area infront of her by a small amount and inflicts stun
ayumi.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical defense at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own physical defense at the start of the battle**
ayumi.s1plus: **medium** physical damage to an area infront of her, reduces the enemy's physical attack by a **medium** amount

wonder ayumi.name: Wonder Ayumi, Za Warudo
wonder ayumi.description: She can perform Za Warudo. I actually don't know what she does. Maybe she can perform well in Arena. I don't even know if Clock ends works on bosses
wonder ayumi.ubdesc: Boosts the action speed by a massive amount (100%), and increases physical defense by 36 for all allies
wonder ayumi.s1desc: Lowers the action speed of all enemies by a small amount (10%). and lowers their physical attack by a medium amount and accuracy by a good bit
wonder ayumi.s2desc: Performs Za Warudo on the enemy with the highest Physical attack
wonder ayumi.exdesc: Increases own physical defense by a large amount at the start of the battle. **5★:Increases it by a large amount at the start of the battle**

chieru.name: Cheiru, Cheru~
chieru.description: She's a niche attacker. If only her p crit matches what she aims to do. Or if her skill 1 lasts throughout the whole battle. Maybe it'll get fixed when her UE gets released
chieru.ubdesc: Large physical damage to the nearest enemy, also increases the crit rate and physical attack by a large amount
chieru.s1desc: Inncreases own physical attack, crit rate and action speed(100%) by a large amount. She gains a cheru everytime she lands a crit onn an enemies. Maximum of 30
chieru.s2desc: Small physical damage to the nearest enemy, reduces physical attack by a large amount and increase physical attack and crit rate based on the number of Chieru she has at the time of using this skill
chieru.exdesc: Increases physical attack by a medium amount at the start of the battle. **5★:Increases physical attack by a large amount at the start of the battle**

chika.name: Chika
chika.description: Magical healer that is focused for physical team. Chika is one of the early game healers. She raises physical attack, hence why she is good with a physical team. Though on UB she does a party wide heal. She is a double edge sword as a summon killed can help enemies with TP
chika.ubdesc: Restores health for all allies by a small amount, and summons a fairy infront of the frontmost ally
chika.s1desc: The frontmost allies and in an area around them will get a small increase of physical attack
chika.s2desc: Lowers the nearest's enemy physical attack by a large amount
chika.exdesc: Increases magical attack by a medium amount at the start of the battle. **5★: Increases magical attack by a large amount at the start of the battle**
chika.s1plus: The frontmost allies and in an area around them will get a **medium** increase of physical attack. **Boost the physical crit of them as well and applies a regen that heals for a medium amount**

christmas chika.name: Christmas Chika
christmas chika.description: A pretty powerful support assuming her sylphs are not deleted. The TP boost is pretty huge if it can stay up for a while. Most oftenly used in Arena, but has some uses in CB where possible
christmas chika.ubdesc: Summons 3 Sylphs infront of her. Purple sylph stands behinds the rearmost vanguard, The blue sylph recovers the TP of all allies by a small amount over time, and the green sylph heals the ally with the lowest HP
christmas chika.s1desc: Increases the physical attack of one ally with the highest physical attack by a large amount
christmas chika.s2desc: All allies within range gains a medium amount of physical defense, restores the TP of all allies effected by a small amount
christmas chika.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle**
christmas chika.s1plus: Increases the physical attack of one ally with the highest physical attack by a large amount, **scales with her magical attack

chloe.name: Chloe, Kuroe
chloe.description: An attacker/debuffer. In a long boss fight, she has high damage potential and high debuff potential too. Her UB does 20 hits and S2 does 5, considering her attack loop just consists of skill 2 and attacks. Would recommend to upgrade her UE before you invest into talent Blooming
chloe.ubdesc: Large amount of damage to the nearest enemy
chloe.s1desc: Gains large amount of physical attack, and applies a cower debuff on the enemy that stacks up to 30. Cower stack goes up by 1 for every hit she lands
chloe.s2desc: Deals a medium amount of physical damage to the nearest enemy and lowers the enemy's physical defense by a small amount. The damage and debuff goes up as she stacks more Cower debuff
chloe.exdesc: Increases physical attack by a medium amount at the start of the battle. **5★:Increases physical attack by a large amount at the start of the battle**
chloe.s1plus: Gains **massive** amount of physical attack, and applies a debuff on the enemy that stacks up to **90**. Debuff stack goes up by 1 for every hit she lands. **This buff now lasts for the entire battle**

christina.name: Christina, Babatina
christina.description: A popular damage dealer that does well in alot of content. Her UE is one of the top most priority. If you have her, make sure to invest whale tears into her.
christina.ubdesc: Large physical damage to the nearest enemy that never misses and is a guaranteed crit. Gains invisibility for a short amounnt of time
christina.s1desc: Increases own physical attack by a medium amount, increases own TP gain rate by a small amount
christina.s2desc: Medium physical damage to the nearest enemy and reduces the enemy's physical defense by a small amount
christina.exdesc: Increases physical attack by a small amount at the start of the battle. **5★: Increase physical attack by a large amount at the start of the battle**
christina.s1plus: Increases own physical attack by a **massive** amount, increases own TP gain rate by a small amount, **restores TP by a large amount. Increases damage done with crits by a small amount(Lasts for the entire battle)**

christmas christina.name: Christmas Christina, Chris Chris
christmas christina.description: She's actually pretty good as a damage dealer, she just has a very weird mechanic where she does damage every other UB. Doesn't make her any less powerful. We'll wait for her UE to come out before having a final say in it
christmas christina.kana: クリスティーナ（クリスマス）
christmas christina.ubdesc: 'If she has no coin, she will deal a large amount of physical damage to the nearest enemy, and boosts her physical attack by a large amount. She gets a coin.' 'If she has a coin. She will instead deal a massive amount of physical damage to the nearest enemy, this attack never misses. She loses a coin'
christmas christina.s1desc: If she has no coin. increases the physical attack of all allies by a medium amount. If she has a coin, increases the physical attack of all allies by a small amount, and increases her own physical attack by a large amount
christmas christina.s2desc: If she has no coin, deals a medium amount of physical damage to the nearest enemy. If she has a coin, deals a medium amount of physical damage to the nearest enemy and boosts the TP Fill rate of the all allies by a small amount
christmas christina.exdesc: Increases own physical attack by a medium amount at the start of the battle. **5★: Increases own physical attack by a large amount at the start of the battle**

djeeta.name: Djeeta
djeeta.description: A single target self accelerating attacker. She's a pretty popular use thanks to her TP boost for the whole team.
djeeta.ubdesc: Deals a large amount of physical damage to the nearest enemy
djeeta.s1desc: Deals a medium amount of physical damage to the nearest enemy
djeeta.s2desc: Recovers a large amount of TP
djeeta.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical attackat the start of the battle at the start of the battle. **5★: Medium increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle**
djeeta.s1plus: Deals a **medium** amount of physical damage to the nearest enemy. **Recovers her own TP by a medium amount. as well as all allies by a medium amount**

emilia.name: Emilia, EMT
emilia.description: Her kit seems powerful. She's a healer/defensive buffer also deals damage. Her UE seems to quadruple her multiplier on Skill 1. It's also not a bad UE to upgrade. But I wouldn't say it's the highest priority to level.
emilia.ubdesc: Healls the ally with the lowest HP by a massive amount. Boosts the physical and magical defense of all allies by a medium amount
emilia.s1desc: Deals medium amount of damage to the nearest enemy and boosts her magical attack by a medium amount
emilia.s2desc: She does 4 hits that each hits for a large amount to random enemies.
emilia.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle at the start of the battle .**5★: Large increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle at the start of the battle.**
emilia.s1plus: Deals **massive** amount of damage to the nearest enemy and boosts her magical attack by a **massive** amount.

eriko.name: Eriko, The Destroyer
eriko.description: A powerful single target physical attacker. She can deal alot of damage in the window of her S1+ Buff. I don't want to say too much about her, cause shluf might be reading this. Also lever her UE. Pcrit is too good
eriko.ubdesc: Large physical damage to then earest enemy, if eriko kills an enemy. Boosts her own physical attack by a large amount
eriko.s1desc: Increases own physical attack by a small amount
eriko.s2desc: Medium amount of physical damage to the nearest enemy. Inflicts poison to them
eriko.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle**
eriko.s1plus: Increases own physical attack by a **large** amount, **additionally increases physical attack and physical crit rate by a massive amount(Lasts for 12s instead of 18 like the rest of S1)**

valentine eriko.name: Valentine Eriko
valentine eriko.description: A powerful but risky attacker. Like every other risky attackers. She deals damage to herself in one of her skill. She also deals more damage the lesser the health she has
valentine eriko.ubdesc: Massive amount of damage to the nearest enemy, The damage goes up as her health gets lower
valentine eriko.s1desc: Deals a small amount of damage to the nearest enemy, The damage goes up as her health gets lower
valentine eriko.s2desc: Large amount of damage to herself. Boosts physical attack by a medium amount,The buff goes up as her health gets lower
valentine eriko.exdesc: Increases own physical attack by a medium amount at the start of the battle. **5★: Increases own physical attack by a large amount at the start of the battle**

grea.name: Grea
grea.description: A very powerful aoe magical attacker. She's kind of a selfish attacker. But she has good reasoning for it. It being she deals a lot of damage herself to multitarget bosses. Her UE increases her TP Fill rate by almost 3 folds. So make sure to have that upgraded.
grea.ubdesc: Large amount of magical damage to an area around the nearest enemy
grea.s1desc: Gains invisibility towards physical and magical and rushes forward. Deals medium magical damage to the nearest enemy
grea.s2desc: Sets a field that deals medium magical damage overtime centered around the enemy that has the highest physical attack
grea.exdesc: Increases own magical attack by a medium amount at the start of the battle. **5★: Increases own magical attack by a large amount at the start of the battle.**
grea.s1plus: Gains invisibility towards physical and magical and rushes forward. Deals **large** magical damage in an area around the nearest enemy

hatsune.name: Hatsune
hatsune.description: Her 6★ the character that defines arena. She has high damage and very long stuns. Not to mention she hits all the enemies. Not even Yukari can help you.
hatsune.ubdesc: Medium magical damage to all enemies. Enemies that deal physical damage will take take an additional small magical damage
hatsune.s1desc: Small magical damage to the enemy with the highest physical attack
hatsune.s2desc: Small magical damage to the enemy with the highest physical attack, inflict stun
hatsune.exdesc: Increases magical attack by a medium amount at the start of battle. **5★:Increases magical attack by a large amount at the start of battle. **
hatsune.s1plus: **Medium** magical damage to all enemies, **enemies that deal physical damage will take extra damage**
hatsune.upgradedesc: Medium magical damage to all enemies. Enemies that deal physical damage will take an additional **large** magical damage, **reduce magical defenses by a small amount and be inflicted with stun**

summer hatsune.name: Summer Hatsune
summer hatsune.description: I guess she does her trademark sleep? You have to have a way to wake her up if you wanna use her. Cause once she starts sleeping. She won't wake up until she takes damage. Currently she doesn't seem to be anything more than just a meme character
summer hatsune.ubdesc: Large magical damage to all enemies, She goes to sleep after
summer hatsune.s1desc: Small magical damage to all enemies to all enemies. Restores a medium amount of TP, TP amount goes up with the number of enemies hit
summer hatsune.s2desc: Medium magical attack and magical crit to all allies in range
summer hatsune.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle. **

hiyori.name: Hiyori
hiyori.description: Hiyori doesn't seem to be any useful at 5★. However at 6★, she can do alot. She does damage against both single target and multitarget bosses. Being a fist character. She just has really high TP fill rate. Would talent blossom her as soon as possible if you can
hiyori.ubdesc: Large physical damage to the nearest enemy, in a small area around the enemy, deals medium amount of physical damage
hiyori.s1desc: Medium physical damage to the nearest enemy
hiyori.s2desc: small physical damage to the nearest enemy, medium increase to own physical attack
hiyori.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical attack power at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own physical attack power at the start of the battle. **
hiyori.s1plus: **Large** physical damage to the nearest enemy, **additionally deals small physical damage to all enemies around them.
hiyori.upgradedesc: **Massive** physical damage to the nearest enemy, **in an area around the enemy**, deals **large** amount of physical damage

new year hiyori.name: New Year Hiyori
new year hiyori.description: An attacker with very good buffs and debuffs. Her kit is very good and fits in well into any physical party.
new year hiyori.ubdesc: Massive physical damage to the nearest enemy, reduces the enemy's physical defense and TP fill rate by a small amount
new year hiyori.s1desc: Large increase to own physical attack, additionally increase all allies that does physical attack will gain a medium amount of physical attack
new year hiyori.s2desc: Large physical damage to the nearest enemy
new year hiyori.exdesc: Increases physical attack by a large amount at the start of the battle. **5★: Increases physical attack by a large amount at the start of the battle. **
new year hiyori.s1plus: Large increase to own physical attack, additionally increase all allies that does physical attack will gain a **massive** amount of physical attack, **physical crit increases by a small amount**

illya.name: Illya
illya.description: Outdated magical AOE attacker. She's a very risky attacker. Her multipliers don't live up to the current standards of health to damage. She does however become a good tank in boss fights. Thanks to her ability to self heal
illya.ubdesc: Large physical damage to an area around the nearest enemy. Heals herself by a medium amount
illya.s1desc: Medium increase in own magical attack, medium magical damage to the nearest enemy and consume a medium amount of HP
illya.s2desc: Medium magical damage to all enemies in range. Consume a medium amount of HP
illya.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle. **
illya.s1plus: **Large** increase in own magical attack, medium magical damage to the nearest enemy and consume a medium amount of HP

christmas illya.name: Christmas Illya
christmas illya.description: The better Illya. Loses the self healing tho, but also reduces the amount of her self dealing damage to 1 skill. Doesn't make her any more weaker. Hopefully she gets even better with UE
christmas illya.ubdesc: Massive magical damage to the nearest enemy, also increases own magical attack by a medium amount. Damage goes up as HP goes down
christmas illya.s1desc: Medium magical damage to the nearest enemy, damage goes up as HP goes down
christmas illya.s2desc: Medium magical damage in an area infront of her. Consumes 20% of her max HP(Not current HP), Damage goes up as HP goes down
christmas illya.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical defense at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own physical defense at the start of the battle.**

inori.name: Inori
inori.description: An arena character. She's actually the first character to be released for us that can inflict burn to enemies. 2nd is Summer Jun
inori.ubdesc: Physical damage to all enemies in range, Inflict burn and large knockback
inori.s1desc: Small physical damage to all enemies within range and inflicts stun
inori.s2desc: Medium physical damage to all enemies within range
inori.exdesc: Medium increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own physical attack at the start of the battle.**

io.name: Io, Io Sensei
io.description: She's not used much even on 6★. Maybe in offensive arena where you can choose your own battle. In Defensive she probably can't do anything since Yukari is a thing. And she's easily countered. Atleast her plot makes her health bloat, so she can take a few hits.
io.ubdesc: Small magical damage to all enemies, inflicts charm
io.s1desc: Small magical damage in an area around the nearest enemy
io.s2desc: SUCCS the enemy's TP and restore her own by a small amount
io.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the batte. **5★: Large increase to own magical attack at the start of the batte**
io.s1plus: **Medium** magical damage in an area around the nearest enemy. **Reduces 'enemies with charm' TP by a large amount. Otherwise, reduces their physical and magical attack by a medium amount**
io.upgradedesc: **Medium** magical damage to all enemies, inflicts charm, **Reduces their TP and TP Fill Rate by a small amount**

summer io.name: Summer Io, Sensei of the night, 'Cute demons that wants to be your slave'
summer io.description: AOE Attacker/Healer, and also a cute demon that wants to be your slave. She's actually pretty good at what she does. She's also almost exclusively for magical teams due to her kit. Her UE just buffs up S1 multiplier.
summer io.ubdesc: Medium magical damage to all enemies, heals all allies by a medium amount
summer io.s1desc: Small magical to all enemies within range, restore the HP of the ally with the lowest amount of HP, healing is dependant by the number of enemies that got hit
summer io.s2desc: Small magical damage to an area around the nearest enemy. Reduces their magical defense by a small amount
summer io.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle. **
summer io.s1plus: **Medium** magical to all enemies within range, restore the HP of the ally with the lowest amount of HP, healing is dependant by the number of enemies that got hit

jun.name: Jun
jun.description: Magical defender that has utilities for a physical party. She doesn't do very well against incoming physical damage. People tend to also talent blossom her before getting her UE. But her UE gives alot of Def. It's probably a good idea to do both before using her.
jun.ubdesc: Deploys a barrier that absorbs incoming magical and physical damage.
jun.s1desc: Searches for the lowest HP around her aream and heal them by a medium amount.
jun.s2desc: Small physical damage to the nearest enemy and reduce their physical defense by a small amount
jun.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical defense at the start of the battle. **5★: Large increase to own magical defense at the start of the battle. **
jun.s1plus: Searches for the lowest HP around her aream and heal them by a **medium** amount. Increase their physical attack and action speed by a small amount

summer jun.name: Summer Jun
summer jun.description: A physical attacker/tank of some sort. Honestly her stats are not bad for a hybrid. It's just that she sits too much behind of anyone to protect anyone. But you can probably find a niche use for her somehow. She transits to having higher physical defense however. Not as high as the normal one.
summer jun.ubdesc: Massive physical damage to the nearest enemy, increases own physical attack and action speed by a large amount

halloween shinobu.name: Halloween Shinobu
halloween shinobu.description: An aoe attacker that does pretty well in Arena, she also does well pretty well in multitarget bosses
halloween shinobu.ubdesc: Large physical damage to one enemy with the lowest HP, if the enemy is defeated by this skill additionally deal medium physical damage to the all enemies
halloween shinobu.s1desc: Increase own physical attack power by large amount
halloween shinobu.s2desc: Medium physical damage to all enemies in front range
halloween shinobu.exname: Song of Night in The Death Realm
halloween shinobu.exdesc: Increase own physical attack power by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical attack power by large amount at the start of battle**
halloween shinobu.s1plus: Increase own physical attack power by massive amount **and increase own critical rate by large amount**

shiori.name: Shiori, Shiorin
shiori.description: A powerful self accelerated attacker. As with all Bow users, they're all fragile. Shiori is worth the level though if you're strapped on attackers. Her UB Cycle is pretty fast. Doing the first UB like 3 Actions in
shiori.ubdesc: Large physical damage to the nearest enemy, permanently increase own physical attack by a medium amount
shiori.s1desc: Small physical damage to three enemies in the front, restore own TP by small amount
shiori.s2desc: Small physical damage to random enemies three times, restore own TP by small amount
shiori.exdesc: Increase own physical attack power by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical attack power by large amount at the start of battle**

magical shiori.name: Magical Shiori, Purely★Shiori.
magical shiori.description: A physical buffer that mainly buffs the area around her. She does quite a bit of damage herself.
magical shiori.ubdesc: Increase all allies physical attack power by massive amount
magical shiori.s1desc: Increase all nearby allies physical attack power by medium amount, increase all nearby allies physical critical rate by medium amount
magical shiori.s2desc: Increase all nearby allies physical attack power by large amount, massive physical damage to the nearest enemy
magical shiori.exdesc: Increase own physical attack power by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical attack power by large amount at the start of battle**

shizuru.name: Onee-Chan
shizuru.description: A sub tank/Main tank if you wanna go that route. The only usable Vanguard if you wanna bring her for a tank is Christina. Honestly would benefit her more if she was more to the front since she gets to take more damage and use her UB more often. Her UB has a really good regen on it. Better than even Jesus Yui's
shizuru.ubdesc: Large physical damage to the nearest enemy, gain physical absorption barrier, doesnt apply any shield if missed
shizuru.s1desc: Restore one ally HP with lowest HP by a small amount
shizuru.s2desc: Grant physical nullification barrier to all allies near Shizuru
shizuru.exdesc: Increase own physical defense by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical defense power by large amount at the start of battle**
shizuru.s1plus: Restore one ally HP with lowest HP by medium amount **and increase ally physical defense by large amount**
shizuru.upgradedesc: Massive physical damage to the nearest enemy, increase physical defense  by massive amount to nearby allies, grants physical absorption barrier and grant HP regen to all nearby allies

valentine shizuru.name: Valentine Shizuru, VShizuru, Valentine Onee-chan
valentine shizuru.description: A very powerful Physical support. She sits at the frontmost midguard. Though that comes as a nice thing itself. Since she is kinda tanky
valentine shizuru.ubdesc: Set a field and increase physical attack power, critical rate and TP gain rate to all allies in the field range
valentine shizuru.s1desc: Restore all allies HP by medium amount and TP by small amount ***If field is active: Restore all allies HP by medium amount and TP by small amount***
valentine shizuru.s2desc: Medium physical damage to the nearest enemy, reduce enemy physical defense by small amount  ***If field is active: Improve this skill effectiveness***
valentine shizuru.exdesc: Increase own physical attacj power by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical physical attack power by large amount at the start of battle**
valentine shizuru.s1plus: Restore all allies HP by medium amount and TP by small amount ***If field is active: Restore all allies HP by medium amount and TP by small amount and Increase all allies physical attack power by large amount***

suzume.name: Suzume
suzume.description: Just don't bother. She's beyond saving at this point really. Bad stats. and bad skills. She just doesn't fit into any party.
suzume.ubdesc: Medium magical damages to all enemies in the front range and reduce enemies physical defense by random amount, small to medium based on her UB animation
suzume.s1desc: Small magical damage to all enemies in the front range
suzume.s2desc: Restore all allies HP near Suzume by small amount and increase all allies near Suzume physical attack power by small amount
suzume.exdesc: Increase own magical attack power by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own magical attack power by large amount at the start of battle**
suzume.s1plus: Small magical damage to all enemies in the front range **and reduce enemies physical and magical defense by small amount**

new year suzume.name: New Year Suzume
new year suzume.description: A defensive support character. She doesn't have the best heal. But she has a pretty good action speed up and a good enough barrier. Nothing to note here really
new year suzume.ubdesc: Restore to all allies HP by medium amount, increase all allies action speed by large amount(60%)
new year suzume.s1desc: Small magical damage to one farthest enemy, inflict knockback
new year suzume.s2desc: Grant magical nullification barrier to all allies
new year suzume.exdesc: Increase own magical attack power by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own magical attack power by large amount at the start of battle**

summer suzume.name: Summer Suzume
summer suzume.description: A summoner, her golem is actualy one of the he most tankiest golem there is. So it can tank for you for a while. Her buffs are also pretty decent as well, I can't tell you much more than that though
summer suzume.ubdesc: Increase all allies physical and magical defense by small amount and continuously restore all allies HP by small amount
summer suzume.s1desc: Summon a golem, attack one enemy at the front
summer suzume.s2desc: Increase all allies within range magical defense by medium amount, centered on the most front ally
summer suzume.exdesc: Increase own magical defense by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own magical defense by large amount at the start of battle**
summer suzume.s1plus: Summon a golem, attack one enemy at the front **and deploy a field centered on the most front allies, increase physical and magical defense by large amount to allies within range**

suzuna.name: Suzuna, Best Girl
suzuna.ubdesc: Large physical damage to the nearest enemy, guaranteed critical hit on initial use
suzuna.s1desc: Medium physical damage to the nearest enemy, guaranteed critical hit
suzuna.s2desc: Increase own physical attack power by medium amount
suzuna.exdesc: Increase own physical attack by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Large increase own physical attack by large amount at the start of battle**
suzuna.s1plus: Large physical damage three times to the nearest enemy, if critical, **deal three times damage instead of two times, one of the damage is guaranteed critical hit**
suzuna.upgrade: Small physical damage three times to the nearest enemy and increase own physical attack power by medium amount, this skill will never miss and always deal critical damage

summer suzuna.name: Summer Suzuna,Best girl
summer suzuna.description: Best girl, do I need to say more?
summer suzuna.ubdesc: Massive physical damage to the nearest enemy, if Suzuna already cast 'Summer Runaway' skill, deal critical
summer suzuna.s1desc: Small physical damage three times to the nearest enemy
summer suzuna.s2desc: Increase own physical attack power by massive amount and fully recover own TP bar
summer suzuna.exdesc: Increase own physical attack by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Large increase own physical attack by large amount at the start of battle**

tamaki.name: Tamaki
tamaki.description: An anti magical attacker with 2 tails. Her 6★ gives her a lot of opportunity to be really good in both boss fights and in arena
tamaki.ubdesc: Massive physical damage to one enemy with highest magical attack power
tamaki.s1desc: Medium physical damage to one enemy with highest magical attack power and reduce enemy magical attack power by small amount
tamaki.s2desc: Reduce one enemy TP with highest magical attack power by small amount and restore own TP by small amount
tamaki.exdesc: Increase own physical defense by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical defense by large amount at the start of battle**
tamaki.s1plus: Medium physical damage to one enemy with highest magical attack power and reduce enemy magical attack power by medium amount, **inflict stun**
tamaki.upgradedesc: Massive physical damage to one enemy with highest magical attack power, if the target is magical attacker deal additional large physical damage reduce enemy physical defense by massive amount

summer tamaki.name: Summer Tamaki
summer tamaki.description: High damage random attacker. She does a lot less TP down in this form. But it's not like it's anything major. In boss fights, she looks to be doing pretty good damage
summer tamaki.ubdesc: Medium physical damage 4 times to random enemy at the front range
summer tamaki.s1desc: Reduce nearest enemy's tp by small amount and restore own TP by small amount
summer tamaki.s2desc: Increase own physical attack power by large amount and increase own action speed by large amount
summer tamaki.exdesc: Increase own physical defense by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical defense by large amount at the start of battle**
summer tamaki.s1plus: Reduce earest enemy's tp by small amount, restore own TP by small amount, **reduce enemy physical attack by large amount, and increase own physical attack power by massive amount**

tomo.name: Tomo
tomo.description: A powerful AOE attacker. She's a self accelerating attacker. And actually needs her UE to be able to actually do damage against multitarget bosses. There are quite a number of uses for her where she can shine. I would definitely recommend
tomo.ubdesc: Medium physical damage to nearest enemy, increase own physical attack by large amount, increase own action speed by medium amount
tomo.s1desc: Medium physical attack to all enemies within range
tomo.s2desc: Medium physical damage to nearest enemy, restore own TP by small amount
tomo.exdesc: Increase own physical defense by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical defense by large amount at the start of battle**
tomo.s1plus: Medium physical attack to all enemies within range **and increase damage based on number of enemies**

tsumugi.name: Tsumugi
tsumugi.description: An arena character. She has the unique ability to pull enemies. It's pretty good if you have an aoe character to deal with them after they're pulled together
tsumugi.ubdesc: Small physical damage to all enemies within range, pull them to center, inflict bind
tsumugi.s1desc: Small physical damage to one enemy at 2nd most front, pull them closer to Tsumugi
tsumugi.s2desc: Small physical damage to all enemies within range, reduce enemies action and movement speed by small amount
tsumugi.exdesc: Increase own physical defense by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical defense by large amount at the start of battle**
tsumugi.s1plus: Medium physical damage to one enemy at 2nd most front, pull them closer **and inflict stun, increase own physical attack power by medium amount, and increase own physical defense by small amount**

halloween tsumugi.name: Halloween Tsumugi
halloween tsumugi.description: A tank! A very very tanky tank. She has powerful debuff against bosses with high Physical attack. She also has a self heal and the ability to slow down the enemy's action speed by a lot. Look into investing into her.
halloween tsumugi.ubdesc: Large physical damage to one enemy with highest physical attack, reduce enemy physical attack power and action speed by large amount
halloween tsumugi.s1desc: Gain physical nullificiation barrier, increase own physical defense by large amount
halloween tsumugi.s2desc: Taunt all enemies, inflict fear to one enemy with highest physical attack , and recover own HP by medium amount
halloween tsumugi.exdesc: Increase own physical defense by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical defense by large amount at the start of battle**

uzuki.name: Uzuki
uzuki.description: AOE version of Djeeta. Basically a self accelerating aoe attacker. Though she's not as fast as Djeeta. She hasn't gotte her UE yet. So we might get something good once it comes out. Until then, her damage is kinda underwhelming.
uzuki.ubdesc: Massive physical damage to all enemies within the front range and increase all allies physical and magical attack power by medium amount
uzuki.s1desc: Restore all allies TP by small amount and increase all allies TP gain by small amount
uzuki.s2desc: Medium physical damage to all enemies within front range
uzuki.exdesc: Increase own physical attack power by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical attack power by large amount at the start of battle**

yori.name: Yori
yori.description: A magical attacker that was made to be used alongside Akari. Self damage without any way to heal herself kinda hurts her. Her frags is also in CB Coins. So I wouldn't expect newer people to be using her that much
yori.ubdesc: Medium magical damage to all enemies in the front range
yori.s1desc: Consume her own HP and increase her magical attack power by large amount
yori.s2desc: Medium magical damage to all enemies at the front position
yori.exdesc: Increase own magical defense by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Large increase own magical defense by large amount at the start of battle**
yori.s1plus: Consume her own HP and increase her magical attack power by massive amount **and recover own TP by medium amount**

angel yori.name: Angel Yori
angel yori.description: A unique support that does well in any party. She has a taunt, it's not a self taunt. more of a taunt for other characters. She can use it to taunt herself. But will prioritize character beside her and infront of her
angel yori.ubdesc: Medium magical damage to one enemy with most TP, reduce enemy TP by medium amount, and reduce enemy magic defense by a medium amount
angel yori.s1desc: Grant taunt to one ally with highest HP in front of Yori, increase ally physical and magical defense by large amount
angel yori.s2desc: Increase all allies physical and magical critical rate, restore all allies HP by small amount
angel yori.exdesc: Increase own magical defense by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Large increase own magical defense by large amount at the start of battle**

yui.name: Yui
yui.description: A pretty good healer. She provides so much physical def buff for your team. Mostly used in normal maps, might need to use her for harder hitting bosses or just Phase 4 CB bosses in general. I'm tired of all these gomen yui jokes man.
yui.ubdesc: Heals all allies by a medium amount
yui.s1desc: Medium damage to the nearest enemy
yui.s2desc: Increases physical defense of all allies by a small amount
yui.exdesc: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle. **5★: Medium increase to own magical attack at the start of the battle**
yui.s1plus: Medium magical damage to the nearest enemy, **also reduces their physical attack by a small amount**
yui.upgradedesc: Heals all allies by a **large** amount,** boost their Physical defense by a large amount, increases all allies' action speed by a large amount(100%) and deploys a barrier that blocks a large amount of physical damage**

new year yui.name: New Year Yui, Jesus Yui, DORIME
new year yui.description: All hail Jesus Yui, She will save us all. Her barrier is just the best in the game. She just does so much. Ignore the fact that she does negative damage.
new year yui.ubdesc: Deploys barriers that negate large physical and magical damage and applies HP Regen per second on all allies but, but lowers Magical Atk by a large amount
new year yui.s1desc: Lowers the second nearest ememy's physical attack and magical attack by a small amount
new year yui.s2desc: Boost the magical attack of all allies that do magical attack by a medium amount
new year yui.exdesc: Yui's magical attack goes up by a medium amount at the start of the battle. **5★: Gains an additional small amount of magical attack**
new year yui.s1plus: Lowers the second nearest ememy's physical attack and magical attack by a small amount, **magical defense by a small amount and medium amount of TP fill rate**

princess yui.name: Princess Yui
princess yui.description: A self accelerated AOE attacker/Buffer. She can dish out alot of damage to multitarget bosses and in Arena. But just don't expect her to do anything more than that. As a prinfest character, she's kinda underwhelming. As an aoe attacker, She's one of the best
princess yui.ubdesc: Deals a large amount of magical damage to all enemies
princess yui.s1desc: Recovers her TP by a medium amount, boost her magical attack and magical critical by a small amount, and boost her damage when doing magical critical attacks by a small amount
princess yui.s2desc: Deals a medium amount of magical damage to all enemies around the 2nd nearest enemey and boost the magical attakck of all allies that do magical attacks by a small amount
princess yui.exdesc: Her magical attack goes up by a small amount at the start of the battle.**5★: Her magical attack goes up by a small amount at the start of the battle.*

yukari.name: Yukari, Onee-San
yukari.description: A very powerful anti magical support. Has everything you need to counter magic damage. She has a nifty single target TP boost.
yukari.ubdesc: Grant magical nullification barrier to all allies
yukari.s1desc: Restore one ally HP with the lowest HP by medium amount
yukari.s2desc: Restore one ally TP with the lowest TP by medium amount
yukari.exdesc: Increase own magical defense by medium amount at the start of battle **5★: Increase own physical attack power by medium amount at the start of battle**
yukari.s1plus: Heal one ally HP with the lowest HP by large amount, **increase to magical defense to given ally by medium amount, grant HP regen to given ally**
yukari.upgradedesc: Grant magical nullification barrier to all allies, increase all allies magic defense by large amount, restore all allies HP by small amount

yuki.name: Yuki
yuki.description: He's a man. But apparently he can charm people? And apparently people are using a 2★ in defensive pvp nowadays. If I were to guess, it would probably be for his TP boost.
yuki.ubdesc: Small magical damage to all enemies and reduce all enemies physical defense by a small amount
yuki.s1desc: Small magical damage to the 2nd closest enemy and inflicts blind
yuki.s2name: My Cute Self Will Support You
yuki.s2desc: Restores one ally TP with highest TP by a medium amount
yuki.exname: My Cute Self Will Do The Best
yuki.exdesc: Medium increase own magical attack power at the start of battle**5★: Medium increase own magical attack power at the start of battle**
yuki.s1plus: Small magical damage to the 2nd closest enemy and inflicts blind **and charm**

yuni.name: Yuni
yuni.description: A valuable buffer for the team. She has the 2nd best single target buff in the game. 2nd to Eriko. She also provides a small but nifty TP Boost. Her magical barrier has been proved useful from time to time
yuni.ubdesc: Increase all allies physical attack power by a massive amount, increase all allies physical critical hit by large amount
yuni.s1desc: Increase physical attack power to one ally with highest physical attack by large amount, increase physical critical hit rate to one ally with highest physical attack by large amount, and restore target TP by small amount, and reduce own physical and magical defense by small amount
yuni.s2desc: Grant TP regeneration to all allies, grant magical nullification barrier to all allies, and reduce own magical attack by large amount
yuni.exdesc: Increase own magical defense at the start of battle by a medium amount**5★: Increase own magical defense at the start of battle by a medium amount**
